programme.desc: The importance of loyalty and trust to Jeter as the Yankees cap off a three-peat beating the New York Mets, and his friendship with Alex Rodriguez is changed.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The Yankees Dynasty ends and we explore 9/11's impact on New York. The Yankees and Boston Red Sox's ancient blood feud is decided in an epic Game 7. Team dynamics change with the addition of new players and personalities.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The Yankees and Jeter suffer the most historic loss in baseball history. Jeter's identity is under attack as he faces challenges in the press, on the field and in his clubhouse.
